pages.text: 21|36|Arau yisakale kupharai karae sihamte yetiya tomaka dekhe tetiya sihamte kerala tomaka upahasara patra hicapehe grahana karae. Sihamte kaya, ‘e'omrae'i se'ijana neki, yiye tomalokara upasyaboraka lai samalocana karae’?, Athaca sihamte'i rahamanara alocanara biraodhita karae.
21|37|Manuhaka srstiye karaa haiche kharadhara praranatarae, atisighrae ma'i sihamtaka mora nidarsanarali dekhuraama; seye tomaloke kharakheda nakaraiba.
21|38|Arau sihamte kaya, ‘yadi tomaloke satyabadi horaa tente koraa e'i pratisrauti ketiya purna ha’ba’

21|39|yadi kaphirasakale se'i samayara katha janilehemtena, yetiya sihamte sihamtara mukhamandala arau pithira paraa ju'i pratiraodha karaiba noraaraiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba (tente sihamte se'i sastika kharakhedakai nibicarailehemtena).
21|40|Baram seya sihamtara oparata akasmikabharae ahiba arau sihamtaka hatabhamba karai diba. Phalata sihamte seya raodha karaiba noraaraiba arau sihamtaka arakaso diya naha’ba.
21|41|Tomara purbe'o bahu raachulara lagata thatraa-bidraupa karaa haichila, parainamata sihamte yi bisaye thatraa-bidraupa karaichila se'itorae sihamtaka paraibestana karai laichila.
21|42|Koraa, ‘raatite ha'omka ba dinate ha'omka rahamanara paraa kone tomalokaka raksa karaiba’? Tathapi'o sihamte nija pratipalakara smaranara paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya.

21|43|Tente sihamtara enekuraa'o kichumana ilaha ache neki yiborae amara paraa sihamtaka raksa karaiba parae? Ihamte dekhuna nijake'i sahaya karaiba noraarae arau amara sastira paraa raksa pabalaiyo sihamte kono asrayadanakarai napaba.

21|44|Baram amiye'i sihamtaka arau sihamtara pitr-purausasakalaka bhoga-sambhara dana karaichilo, lagate sihamtara ayu kala'o achila dighaliya. Sihamte dekha na'ine ye, ami prthiraikhanaka carai'ophalara paraa sankucita karai ani acho. Tathapi'o sihamte'i bijayi ha’bane
